channel.title: Runescape Private Server online but people can't connect!
channel.description:
Someone PLEASE help me, i'm begging you.
I recently started up a Runescape Private Server again and everything is working fine and the server is online, I checked. I can log in fine but NOBODY else can connect! Everyone who tries to connect get's an error! But it makes no sense, it says it's online and i'm doing everything right.
Can someone please help me in what it could possibly be?

item.title: Runescape Private Server online but people can't connect!
item.dc:creator: @junkfroggy junkfroggy
item.description:
@junkfroggy wrote:

If you have the client compiled with the correct IP.
The problem you are facing is that you need port forward your server.

Read full topic
item.source: Runescape Private Server online but people can't connect!

item.title: Runescape Private Server online but people can't connect!
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

change the client server ip to yours and release it to them?

Read full topic
